alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 2:39PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Wakulla and south central Leon Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 239 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Crawfordville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, Woodville, Wakulla, Shadeville, Brown House, Leon Sinks, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Arran, Hilliardville, Eight Mile Pond, Tully, Vereen, Spring Creek, Bethel and Helen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
